item.title: 150 Aircraft, Cyber Effects and ‘Overwhelming Force:’ How the Venezuela Operation Unfolded
item.description: "Failure of one component of this well-oiled machine would have endangered the entire mission," Gen. Dan Caine said of Operation Absolute Resolve.

item.title: U.S. Attacks Venezuela, Captures Leader Maduro
item.description: President Donald Trump said the US would temporarily "run" the South American nation and "take back" oil he said was "stolen."

item.title: Health Tech Companies Net Series B Funding To End 2025
item.description: Curative and Angle Health raised nine figures in December.
